description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A HIP TO GABLE AND REAR ROOF DORMER EXTENSION
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The hip to gable and rear roof dormer extensions , by reason of volume, would exceed the permitted development tolerances set out in Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B.1 (d) (i) of the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015. Planning permission would therefore be required.

Reason : 2 - The hip to gable and rear roof dormer extension, by reason of proposed materials , would fail to accord with the criteria set out in Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B.2 (a) of the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015. Planning permission would therefore be required.

Reason : 3 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton  (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:
"	Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
"	Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
"	As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.
In this instance:
"	The application was not considered to comply with the provisions of the Development Plan and NPPF as submitted, and would have required substantial changes such that a new application would be required. 
"	The applicant/agent was informed of any issues arising during consideration of the application and how these could potentially be overcome but there was insufficient reduction in volume and the request for similar materials was not forthcoming. 
"	It is noted that the applicant/agent did not engage in any pre-application discussions.
"	The applicant is advised to seek pre-application advice on any resubmission.
